mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kb_project_members WHERE id= #{id} AND delete_status=0
SELECT * FROM kb_project_members WHERE project_id= #{projectId} AND member=#{member} AND delete_status=0
SELECT count(*) FROM kb_project_members WHERE project_id= #{projectId} AND member=#{userName} AND delete_status=0

SELECT user.name as userName,user.email as email FROM kb_project_members members LEFT JOIN kb_user_registration user ON members.member=user.NAME WHERE project_id=#{projectId} AND members.delete_status=0 AND user.delete_status=0

SELECT project.id AS id,project.name AS name FROM kb_project project LEFT JOIN kb_project_members members ON project.id=members.project_id WHERE members.member=#{userName} AND project.delete_status=0 AND members.delete_status=0
mapper.delete: UPDATE kb_project_members SET delete_status=1 WHERE member=#{memberName} AND project_id=#{projectId} AND delete_status=0
